author: franklyawesome_
content: Not sure if this is the best place but I have a question for anyone familiar with OE, we're building OE specced tracing APIs for Besu and in our conformance tests we noticed some discrepancies in the way the latest OE ver. treats SSTORE and we found out EIP2200 which was part of Istanbul was missing and we couldn't find a way to include it. Since Istanbul was in 2019 we're hoping there's something we're missing here?
